name: Trump Tower Typing Tutor
description:
Each character has an agenda of characters they need to meet with in their chat bubble. Type the word on their floor to pick them up and type the word on the fool or of one of their meetings to drop them off. Once all meetings have been held the level proceeds. Characters will become impatient in between meetings. Wait too long and they'll start tweeting causing a game over.

New animations and soundtrack to come soon.
